TEMPLATE_CAPTION.en: Replace this template caption in composition.json::PAGES

INTRO_TEXT_1.en: In this experiment, you are shown a number of images. In these images you see “Bob” moving in an environment. Bob’s task is to move to the end of the environment. There are differently coloured areas. Generally, Bob prefers to use white coloured areas instead of grey ones. There are also differently coloured “berries” that Bob may like enough to make a detour to pick them up. Your task is to, by looking at example paths taken by Bob, determine what Bob likes and how much.

INTRO_2_STIMULUS.en: You are shown one or more image like this, depicting Bob’s movements.

TEXT_2.en: Let’s practice! Here you see an example path taken by the robot. Take a look at it and pay attention to a) if the robot picks up the berry, and what the colour of the berry is; b) if there are any gray areas and if the robot avoids them. Please note that once you press ‘ready’, you can’t look back.
